build.beforeBuildCommand: npx cross-env CI=false GENERATE_SOURCEMAP=false REACT_APP_SERVER_URL=$SERVER_URL react-scripts build

security.csp: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self'; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://fonts.googleapis.com; font-src 'self' https://fonts.gstatic.com data:; connect-src 'self' ipc://localhost ws: wss: http: https:; img-src 'self' data: https: blob:; media-src 'self' blob: data:;

bundle.shortDescription: A modern chat and voice communication platform
bundle.longDescription: Nexus is a self-hosted chat and voice communication platform featuring text channels, voice channels with WebRTC, direct messaging, screen sharing, custom emojis, soundboards, and more.
